resources.string:
Welcome to Temperature Data Trends.

Swipe left to learn more about the program.

Let's get started.
The measurements are shared with Public Health officials as part of Fever Watch.\n\nPublic Health officials will monitor the measurements and may contact you.
Use the provided thermometer.\n\nDo not eat or drink immediately prior to taking your temperature.
Please confirm your user ID. If your user ID is incorrect, please contact Public Health Services.
%d hr and %d min since last measurement.
